hackathon-description-text: The commerce business has changed dramatically during the last 15 years. Can you imagine what the future will look like? Answer this essential question, by hacking yourselves into e-commerce and create new possibilities for the e-commerce ecosystem.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: form 1 to 10, how innovative is the idea of the team ? (1 = not even a little; 10 = something no one ever thought about)
form 1 to 10, is the prototype user friendly and satisfying costumer needs? (1 = complicated and not very smart designed; 10 = very user friendly and satisfying costumer needs)
from 1 to 10, how high do you estimate the prototypes market potential? (1 = no chance at all; 10 = could be the next big thing)

from 1 to 10, how well did the team use the API's and how is the prototypes tangibility? (1 = no API used & no finished product; 10 = at least one API was used in a reasonable way & the product has all key features)

hackathon-description-header: With 7HACK 2017, ProSiebenSat.1 Media SE opens its doors for the second time to developers, designers and creatives, to team up for 24 hours and generate valued outcomes.
